mapper.select: SELECT a.id, a.title, a.status, a.enroll_start_time, a.id, a.title, a.status, a.enroll_start_time, a.enroll_end_time, a.activity_start_time, a.activity_end_time, a.activity_position, a.score_can_get, a.enroll_num_limit, s.school_name, o.organizer_name FROM activity AS a INNER JOIN activity_user_map AS aum ON aum.activity_id = a.id INNER JOIN school AS s ON s.id = a.activity_school_id INNER JOIN organizer AS o ON o.id = a.activity_organizer_id where user_id=#{id};

SELECT a.id, a.title, a.status, a.enroll_start_time, a.id, a.title, a.status, a.enroll_start_time, a.enroll_end_time, a.activity_start_time, a.activity_end_time, a.activity_position, a.score_can_get, a.enroll_num_limit FROM activity AS a limit #{pageNum},#{pageSize};
mapper.update: UPDATE activity SET enroll_num=enroll_num+1 WHERE id=#{id} AND status=1 and is_deleted=0 and enroll_num < enroll_num_limit;
